content:
This is a great opportunity to work with Jonathan Protzenko at Azure Research (Microsoft). They are looking for an expert in Lean who can help with:

  • Technology: Scaling up proofs of programs within the Lean proof assistant (see the ICFP tutorial here).
  • Proofs: Contributing to mathematical proofs of cryptographic algorithms.
  • Research: Writing up findings and publishing in top academic venues.

You can find the job posting here.

After applying, please send a message to CÃ©dric (fournet@microsoft.com) and Jonathan (protz@microsoft.com). The ideal start timeline is within the next six months.
This is also an opportunity to work with @Son Ho who will also be joining Azure Research to work on program verification and in particular the Lean backend of the Aeneas project!
